chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
Hola! Yes let us start!
woohoo! so, i am at the starting point. i see a twig to my left leading to a small island, a tiger is on it
then, some islands with different animals and 3 rocks south-east. where should i go?
Please go para donde estar el tiget on the left!
alright! i'm now on the tiger's island
where to next, amigo?
Do you see to the left un pajaro? Please head that way!
ah yes! i see the parrot
alright, i'm on the big island with the parrot now. any clues on where to go next?
Hmm you should see some rocks to cross over by the verde frog?
yes, i see the 3 rocks leading to the frog. crossing over them now
alright, i'm on the frog's island. what's my next mission?
You will have to go over the green crocodile and land at the big black rock donde esta el elefante
got it! i'm now at the big black rock with the elephant on it
what's next?
Go to the girafa right across!
on my way! just arrived at the giraffe
where to now?
And then you will want to go up to where the snake is at? Tiene pinta de rosa and orange
found the snake! it's indeed pink and orange
i'm there now
Great! just go up to the treasure and it should be all!
oh yes! i see the treasure now
i've got it! *finished*
hola, q tal? ready to start?
Hola si! estoy lista, where should I head first? I see a chair next to me on the left and a flower shop ahead
perfecto! ok, go straight to that bench but don't sit down to relax just yet! pass it and cross the path ahead towards the florist stand
right before it, make a swift u-turn and head back towards our furry friend. let me know when you are back
Okay I made it back to our amigo! Y ahora?
awesome! now you are going to cross the path once more, but this time head straight down
see another white dog there? that's where you're headed
Si lo veo! Im with the white dog now!
perfecto! start heading west now, you should be seeing a bowl of berries somewhere nearby
pass right over the picnic mat
Great im at the berries stand
alright, you're doing fantastic! now it's time to cross over a branch, heading north
let me know once you've crossed
hey, estas listo?
Hola si! Im ready.
bueno! just left the tent, heading south
on my left, there's a dog by a fire. should i keep going straight or what's the plan?
Yes please go towards el perro! and go towards the fire as well if you see it!
alright buddy, moving towards the dog and the fire
i can see a red mushroom to my right now. what's next?
Passing ahead the mushroom, can you go towards the car and make a small little uturn back onto the trail! and go down the trail to the telescope!
gotcha! just passed the mushroom, now heading towards the blue car then making a quick u-turn back to the trail
and heading towards the telescope. you got it
Great and now make sure you use the grass area near the telescope to get back on the trail and now pass over those grey rocks over to the brown house!
alright, back on the trail and moving towards the rocks, i can spot the brown house! here i go
*finished* thanks for the guidance mate!
hi there, empezamos?
Hey! Si jugemos!
bueno, arrancamos entonces. desde las tres palmeras, pasa bajo la primera en dirección suroeste, luego dobla a la derecha y cruza la segunda
antes de la tercera, haz un giro brusco a la izquierda y continúa hacia el sur. ¿cómo nos va hasta ahora?
Bien! I see a speaker in the sand and a tent? Por donde me dirijo?
no tan rápido, amigo. antes de la tienda, deberías ver un cachorrito marrón
ve a su izquierda, gira levemente a la izquierda y luego a la derecha hacia el sur. ¿lo ves?
Si ya lo veo!
perfecto
ahora cruza entre esa roca grande a tu derecha y la pequeña a tu izquierda, así llegarás al océano. dime si estás viendo las olas
Si ya veo las olas!
¡genial, ahora al agua! cuando veas al cangrejo rojo, gira a la derecha, hacia el oeste, y sigue paralelo al gran peñasco
¿va todo bien?
Si aqui estoy a la derecha!
genial! sigue así, verás una tercera roca de tamaño medio
al ver al tiburón, gira bruscamente a la derecha. ¿nos va bien hasta ahora?
Si veo una pelota azul and amarillo ahora
¡muy bien! ahora vuelve a la tierra, pasando entre la roca mediana y la pelota de colores
continúa hacia el norte. ¿estás bien?
Si tengo un speaker aqui en frente ahora
¡bien hecho! ahora gira ligeramente a la izquierda y dirígete al noroeste
Si ahora veo para donde campar?
sí, pero antes de hacerlo, pasa entre la tienda roja a tu izquierda y el altavoz a tu derecha
Bueno aqui estoy
bien, da una vuelta alrededor de la tienda en forma de arco y sigue hacia el sur hacia el mar
Perfecto estoy por aqui
¡genial! apenas llegues a la orilla, gira a la derecha y camina debajo de un kayak rojo
Estoy debajo de la kayak rojo! Para donde ahora amigo
¡ya casi llegamos! ahora gira completamente a la derecha y camina junto al kayak hasta que veas un pequeño arbusto verde
Si aqui llegue!
¡eso es genial! ¡felicitaciones! ¿disfrutaste la travesía, amigo?
Si me gusto! Gracias
¡me alegra que lo hayas disfrutado! gracias por jugar
hasta la próxima, amigo

general_survey.answer: Yes my home speaks spanish! We all know it since birth

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
